title: Rusty sword

properties.name: description
properties.value: A rusted swords is a broken sword that can be repaired by bringing it to Tindel Marchant in Port Khazard and paying 100 coins or repaired on a whetstone or on an armour stand in a player-owned house workshop. All three options have a chance to break the sword, however the chance of it breaking on the whetstone or armour stand decreases with Smithing level.[1] Successfully repairing a rusty sword yields 25 Smithing experience.

Rusty sword

Advanced data
Item ID686

A rusted swords is a broken sword that can be repaired by bringing it to Tindel Marchant in Port Khazard and paying 100 coins or repaired on a whetstone or on an armour stand in a player-owned house workshop. All three options have a chance to break the sword, however the chance of it breaking on the whetstone or armour stand decreases with Smithing level.[1] Successfully repairing a rusty sword yields 25 Smithing experience.

It is obtained as loot from monsters or by pickpocketing a H.A.M. Member, requiring 15 Thieving.

Giving Tindel Marchant a rusty sword is an Easy Ardougne Diary task.

Possible rewards[edit | edit source]

The average Rusty sword repair is worth 120.5. Getting a rusty sword repaired by Tindel Marchant yields an average net profit of 20.5 coins.

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 14 February 2017. (Archived from the original on 19 December 2021.) Mod Ash: "Your Smithing level controls the chance of breaking it, but has no bearing on what sword it becomes if you succeed."
